value_i18n.en_US: Izertia is a digital workspace solution based in Liferay DXP
We help you with the cultural transformation of your company by serving employee needs with a consistent experience.

Organizations must create better employee experiences to build effective teams that can thrive amid complex business processes. Izertia by Izertis includes a wide range of key capabilities to cover all the employees day to day requirements.

• Modern, flexible, scalable intranet
  • High productivity
  • Improve organisational knowledge
  • Social & mobile
  • Customer tested
  • Your partners intranet for daily use
  • Constantly-evolving
  • Multi-language
  • Responsive
  • Modular

value_i18n.en_US: Improve your communication with your employees
Create a communiaction channel with your employees and connect with them through a personalized, agile and social tool.
Break silos with wikis, chats and social networks where you can share internal knowledge and facilitate the exchange of ideas.
Unify in one place the talent management, know the opinions of your employees through surveys, enable an academic secretary, communicate through internal social networks, etc.

• Agile communication with your employees, mobile experience, knowledge exchange, employee satisfaction, developing your people & culture philosophy.
  • Speed up administrative procedures such as managing employee procedures -- time registration, holidays, expenses, payroll, etc.
  • Greater agility and lower administrative costs with standardized processes.

Izertis is an IT consulting company that facilitates digital transformation in organizations through the implementation of solution, technological and innovation services.

We modernize our clients' business processes and models to improve their profitability, competitiveness and adaptation to change in the competitive framework of the digital economy. Since 1996 we have provided services to companies, institutions and public administrations.
